Assembly with preprocessing

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Unicycler assembly of SARS-CoV-2 genome with preprocessing to remove human genome reads](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/assembly/tutorials/assembly-with-preprocessing/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
